name: Blocks of Persia
description:
Celebrating the 30th anniversary of the original Prince of Persia released on October 3rd, 1989 by Jordan Mechner & Brøderbund. 

This project is still a work in progress and my current goal is to completely recreate the DOS port in a modern engine (I'm currently using Unity3D).  Additionally, I would like to include a Level Editor if time allows for it.

Disclaimer: I'm doing this for academic & educational purposes. No harm is intended to the original or current owners of the Prince of Persia IP. If you are the owner and would like to have the project removed, please send me a message.

To the Fans & Prince of Persia community: If you like the project and would like to see it developed into a final product, please rate, comment & share the link.

Controls:

*Original Manual for detailed instructions:

http://www.abandonia.com/files/extras/26916_Extra%20document_Manual.pdf

ActionButtonRunLeft & Right ArrowsJumpUp ArrowCrouchDown ArrowContext Action 
(Careful step, Grab ledges, Sword attack)Spacebar
(Shift in the original game)
Jump ForwardUp + Forward Arrows Additional buttons (Debug) ActionButtonNext LevelNPrevious LevelP
